text: Colobothea scolopacea is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Wilhelm Ferdinand Erichson in 1847. It is known from Peru.BioLib.cz - Colobothea scolopacea. Retrieved 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Colobotheini Category:Beetles described in 1847
title: Colobothea scolopacea
